Module RestfulCaptcha::Rails::ViewPlugin
In: pkg/RestfulCaptcha-1.0.0/lib/restful_captcha/rails/view_plugin.rb
lib/restful_captcha/rails/view_plugin.rb

Synopsis

The methods in this module are available to use anywhere in template code.

RestfulCaptcha::Rails::ControllerPlugin also defines some helpers that are available in template code.

Methods

captcha_tag   captcha_tag  

Public Instance methods

captcha_tag(options={})

Returns an HTML image tag with an href pointing to the image url of the captcha associated with the current user. This method calls ActionController::Base#reset_captcha; so a different captcha is shown every time this method is called.

The optional options hash is passed to the image_tag method, which is used to generate the HTML tag for the displayed image.
